task.title: Adding Classes to Agent Nodes
task.shortdesc: In this guide you'll use the puppetlabs-apache module to launch the default Apache virtual host.

taskbody.prereq: Prerequisites: This guide assumes you've already installed a monolithic PE deployment, installed at least one *nix agent node, and installed the puppetlabs-apache module[puppetlabs-apache module](./quick_start_module_install_nix.html).
taskbody.context: Every module contains one or more classesclasses. Classes are named chunks of Puppet code and are the primary means by which Puppet Enterprise configures nodes. The puppetlabs-apache module you installed contains a class called apache. In this example, you'll use the apache class to launch the default Apache virtual host. You'll create a group calledapache example and add the apache class to it.
